EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-05-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Rewired Stories from the Indirect Path to Coding and Using Concourse Dashboards to Analyze Progress
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
May 17, 2018 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/rewired-stories-from-the-indirect-path-to-coding-ce1ed35cc0e2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Rewired: Stories from the Indirect Path to Coding Hear from people who made the pivot into engineering. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/rewired-stories-from-the-indirect-path-to-coding-ce1ed35cc0e2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/to-speed-software-development-use-build-pipelines-then-use-concourse-dashboards-to-analyze-progress?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> To Speed Software Development, Use Build Pipelines. Then, Use Concourse Dashboards To Analyze Progress. If a picture is worth a thousand words, a real-time view of your pipelines is priceless. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/to-speed-software-development-use-build-pipelines-then-use-concourse-dashboards-to-analyze-progress?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.bostonglobe.com/business/2018/05/11/air-force-lab-takes-aim-han-solo-record/MLDf23GSy1ZgvmSVEXF09I/story.html]]> Boston Globe: Air Force Lab Takes Aim at Han Solo’s Record Learn how our partnership with the Air Force is helping set new speed records in the development of mission-critical military software. Read More <[[https://www.bostonglobe.com/business/2018/05/11/air-force-lab-takes-aim-han-solo-record/MLDf23GSy1ZgvmSVEXF09I/story.html]]> <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-small-batch-approach-to-validating-your-business-model-53250a750f1?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Small Batch Approach to Validating Your Business Model Hadrien Raffalli, Labs PM at Pivotal Tokyo, breaks down interpreting different customer commitments and experiments when validating your business model. Is Your MVP Actually Viable? <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-small-batch-approach-to-validating-your-business-model-53250a750f1?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/zero-to-cloud-in-12-easy-steps-9a23c43f0132?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Zero to Cloud in 12 Easy Steps Denise Yu breaks down the 12 Factors, and how they apply to applications running on Cloud Foundry and similar platforms. 12 Factors to Cloud Readiness <[[https://builttoadapt.io/zero-to-cloud-in-12-easy-steps-9a23c43f0132?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/need-to-secure-credentials-for-off-platform-services-in-pcf-try-the-credhub-service-broker-now-in-beta-we-take-an-inside-look?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The CredHub Service Broker is Now in Beta! Need to Secure Credentials for Off-Platform Services in PCF? Learn how CredHub Service Broker can help. Take an Inside Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/need-to-secure-credentials-for-off-platform-services-in-pcf-try-the-credhub-service-broker-now-in-beta-we-take-an-inside-look?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/conference-news-white-papers-catsup-with-jared-ruckle-dellemc-conference-cf-summit-na-2018-ep-102?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Conference, News, and White Papers Catsup with Jared Ruckle (Ep. 102) Jared Ruckle joins Richard and Coté to discuss Dell Technologies World, CF Summit, Kubecon, and Microsoft Build as well as the new Built to Adapt Benchmark. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/conference-news-white-papers-catsup-with-jared-ruckle-dellemc-conference-cf-summit-na-2018-ep-102?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 5/24 Simplified Machine Learning, Text, and Graph Analytics with Pivotal Greenplum, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/may-24-simplified-machine-learning-text-and-graph-analytics-with-pivotal-greenplum-webinar?utm_source=field&utm_medium=webinars&utm_campaign=distrib-analytics-greenplum-451&utm_term=q218]]>
6/5 Core Spring Training Session, Online <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1094]]>
